1.0.2.name: wordpress/magazi-admin-theme
1.0.2.description:
A clean, minimalistic administration theme inspired from the new customizer look of wordpress 3.4.1 It's pretty basic and adds a css file to your administration.

Since this plugin was created I have used the knowledge that I have acquired to build the bootstrap admin theme, which I would recomend you use instead of this one. You can get it here: http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/bootstrap-admin/

This project was built for the http://magazi.org network of stores.
